StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.description: The number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingNumberOfS.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingNumberOfS.description: The remaining number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Tax Benefit from Stock Options Exercised (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Reductions in the entity's income taxes that arise when compensation cost (from non-qualified stock options) recognized on the entity's tax return exceeds compensation cost from non-qualified stock options recognized on the income statement. This element increases net cash provided by operating activities.

TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1.label: Tax Benefit from Stock Options Exercised (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1.description: Tax benefits realized from the exercise of stock options resulting in reductions in the entity's income taxes, which increases net cash provided by operating activities.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TaxesExcludingIncomeAndExciseTaxes.label: Taxes, Miscellaneous
TaxesExcludingIncomeAndExciseTaxes.description: All taxes not related to income of the entity or excise or sales taxes levied on the revenue of the entity that are not reported elsewhere. These taxes could include production, real estate, personal property, and pump tax.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnbilledContractsReceivable.label: Unbilled Contracts Receivable
UnbilledContractsReceivable.description: Unbilled amounts due for services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the entity and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts associated with contracts or programs where the recognized revenue for performance thereunder exceeds the amounts billed under the terms thereof as of the date of the balance sheet.

UnbilledReceivablesCurrent.label: Unbilled Receivables, Current
UnbilledReceivablesCurrent.description: Amount received for services rendered and products shipped, but not yet billed, for non-contractual agreements due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits Resulting in Net Operating Loss Carryforward (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.description: Amount of an unrecognized tax benefit that is directly related to a position taken in a tax year that results in a net operating loss carryforward. This amount is presented as a reduction of the related deferred tax asset in the balance sheet if that deferred tax asset is not used. This amount is presented separately from the deferred tax asset for a net operating loss carryforward if this unrelated tax benefit is associated with a different tax position.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UnregulatedOperatingRevenue.label: Unregulated Operating Revenue
UnregulatedOperatingRevenue.description: The amount of unregulated operating revenues recognized during the period.

UtilitiesOperatingExpenseGasAndPetroleum.label: Utilities Operating Expense, Gas and Petroleum Purchased
UtilitiesOperatingExpenseGasAndPetroleum.description: Amount of operating expense for purchased gas and petroleum of regulated operation.

UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenanceAndO.label: Utilities Operating Expense, Maintenance and Operations
UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenanceAndO.description: Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance, repairs and operations of regulated operation.

UtilitiesOperatingExpenseTaxes.label: Utilities Operating Expense, Taxes
UtilitiesOperatingExpenseTaxes.description: Amount of operating expense for taxes other than income taxes of regulated operation.

WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.label: Weighted Average Basic Shares Outstanding, Pro Forma
WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.description: The weighted average number of shares (units) outstanding in the calculation of pro forma basic earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesContingentl.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Contingently Issuable
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesContingentl.description: Shares issuable for little or no cash consideration upon the satisfaction of certain conditions (contingently issuable shares) are considered outstanding common shares and included in the computation of basic Earnings Per Share as of the date that all necessary conditions have been satisfied (in essence, when issuance of the shares is no longer contingent). Outstanding common shares that are contingently returnable (that is, subject to recall) are treated in the same manner as contingently issuable shares. Contingently issuable shares include shares that (a) will be issued in the future upon the satisfaction of specified conditions, (b) have been placed in escrow and all or part must be returned if specified conditions are not met, or (c) have been issued but the holder must return all or part if specified conditions are not met. The number of contingently issuable shares is determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Employer Contributions, Next Fiscal Year
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.description: Amount of contribution expected to be received by defined benefit plan from employer in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

DividendsCommonStockPaidinkind.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Paid-in-kind
DividendsCommonStockPaidinkind.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

DefinedBenefitPlanSettlementsPlanAssets.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Payment for Settlement
DefinedBenefitPlanSettlementsPlanAssets.description: Amount of payment, which decreases plan assets of defined benefit plan, for irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Transaction constituting settlement includes, but is not limited to, making lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and purchasing nonparticipating annuity contract.

ServicingAssetMeasurementInput.label: Servicing Asset, Measurement Input
ServicingAssetMeasurementInput.description: Value of input used to measure servicing asset.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DividendsCommonStockStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Stock
DividendsCommonStockStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.label: Gain (Loss) on Termination of Lease
GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.description: Amount of gain (loss) on termination of lease before expiration of lease term.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEarlyContr.label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Early Contract Termination Fees
LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEarlyContr.description: The amount of early contract termination fees included in liabilities subject to compromise.

NetRentableArea.label: Net Rentable Area
NetRentableArea.description: Net rentable area for properties owned.
